alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Union; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 6:59AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT LAFAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN YALOBUSHA AND WEST CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM CST... At 659 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Water Valley, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Water Valley, Holly Springs National Forest, Springdale, Cambridge, Denmark, Velma, Etta, Paris, Abbeville, Taylor, Altus, Keel, Burt, College Hill Station, College Hill, and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.
